JOB DESCRIPTION: As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.    Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.   Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment.   Fully competent in own area of expertise.
